instructions: All families of six children in a city were surveyed. In 72 families the exact order of births of boys and girls was G B G B B G. What is your estimate of the number of families surveyed in which the exact order of births was B G B B B B?

items.question: What is your estimate of the number of families surveyed in which the exact order of births was B G B B B B?

metadata.comparison_standard: G B G B B G (72 families)
